criteria: Jint sandbox security tests passing; AuditLog service integration tests passing; DB migrations apply and roll back cleanly.
success_metrics: Zero critical security flaws in sandbox; 100% test pass rate.

criteria: E2E tests for script CRUD and Preview (both live and sample data) are passing; Database inspection confirms encryption at rest for script content.
success_metrics: Full user workflow for script management is functional and secure.

gate_name: Sprint 5 Quality Gate: Go/No-Go for Release
criteria: Legacy migration script passes dry-run in staging with <0.1% validation error; Rollback procedure is successfully executed in a 'game day' exercise; Performance benchmarks pass.
success_metrics: High confidence in production cutover; Compliance features meet audit requirements.
